english.segment1: We can hear it growing louder. Songs from every nation. Rising to Your throne. Saints in every generation. Singing for Your glory. Telling what You've done
english.segment2: From the north and south. We are crying out. There is hope in Jesus' name
english.segment3: You're amazing God. You're amazing God. You can bear the weight of every heavy heart. You can heal the pain. You can clean the stain. You can turn our tears into songs of praise. You're amazing God
english.segment4: Beauty rises from the ashes. Sorrow turns to gladness. When our God is near. You speak light into our darkness. You heal the broken-hearted. You wipe away our tears
english.segment5: From the north and south. We are crying out. There is hope in Jesus' name
english.segment6: You're amazing God. You're amazing God. You can bear the weight of every heavy heart. You can heal the pain. You can clean the stain. You can turn our tears into songs of praise. You're amazing God
english.segment7: Songs of praise surround us. Songs of praise surround us. Hear it growing louder. We are growing louder
